programme.title: Is It Haunted?
programme.desc: After 1066, William the Conqueror established the mark of his authority in every important place, and the town of Wisbech, at that time on the sea, was deemed worthy of a stone fortress. In 1236, both Town and Castle were swept away in a terrible inundation. The castle remained in ruins for the better half of a century, and then was rebuilt and became one of ten castles, palaces and manor houses attached to the See of Ely. In the times of persecution, Wisbech Castle became a state ecclesiastical prison, incarcerating Catholics in the reigns of Elizabeth, James I and Charles I and Protestants in that of Queen Mary. Many were executed. It is possible even that the Gunpowder Plot was hatched at the Castle. Since Wisbech was a Cromwellian area, the Castle, by now in a state of terminal dilapidation, was sold in 1658 to the Right Honourable John Thurloe, Cromwell’s Secretary of State. He had the ruined castle demolished and replaced it by a most elegant house designed by Peter Mills, a pupil of Inigo Jones. At the Restoration, Thurloe’s Mansion reverted to the See of Ely and was occupied by members of the Southwell family over a period of a hundred and five years. Then in 1792 it was put up for sale, and purchased by Joseph Medworth, a former Wisbech Charity boy who had succeeded in business. He offered it for sale to the Corporation for the use of the Grammar School, but they declined. Medworth had the Mansion demolished. Using much of the same materials, he managed to replace it with the regency villa, which stands today.

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show
programme.desc: A short history of mind control experimentation beginning with the Nazis through to the CIA’s infamous MK Ultra program. Richard speaks with several researchers and investigators about their claims that several infamous assassins, such as Lee Harvey Oswald, Sirhan Sirhan and Mark David Chapman, were not criminally responsible for their acts, but were either programmed killers or programmed to take the fall.

programme.title: Aliens Uncovered
programme.desc: With the recent release of Alien bodies at the Mexico disclosure event, we have to revisit the questions of alien visitation and the Mayan civilization. This doc explore an avenue you don't see on the popular shows.

programme.title: Conspiracy
programme.desc: Conspiracy is a video documentary series that explores the dark and controversial stories behind history's most well-known conspiracies. The series aims to take a neutral position on very polarizing topics while helping viewers uncover the truth.

programme.title: Morris's Paranormal Adventures UK
programme.desc: In this episode, we venture into this extremely haunted location known for its ghostly figure of a 7ft tall dark entity wearing a top hat and chasing the locals out.

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show
programme.desc: Richard examines the growing UFO Disclosure movement and its attempts to force the US Government to reveal to the public what it knows about UFOs and aliens. Interviews include a noted historian who uncovered numerous declassified documents demonstrating the U.S. Government, the military and the intelligence community are concerned about the UFO phenomenon; and Canada's former minister of defence who says he has it on good authority that officials within the U.S. Government have met face-to-face with extraterrestrials.

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show
programme.desc: An investigation into the practice of past-life regression therapy; a technique where subjects are placed under hypnosis in order to recover memories of supposed past lives. In this episode, a young woman anxious to learn why she is afraid to have children travels back to 19th-century, rural America where she re-experiences a tragic loss

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show
programme.desc: What on Earth are they spraying? Richard travels into the field to meet several researchers who present compelling evidence that chemicals or biological agents are being deliberately sprayed into the atmosphere by some shadowy government agency. Theories as to why they are spraying range from weather control, depopulation and mind control.

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show
programme.desc: Richard speaks with the founders of Architects and Engineers for 911 Truth and Firefighters for 911 Truth who present their case that the WTC towers were brought down by controlled demolition on 9/11. A Fire and Explosives expert refutes their claims.

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show
programme.desc: The religious practice known as exorcism is examined as well as claims of demonic possession. Richard travels to a Catholic seminary in Yonkers, New York where he interviews a board certified psychiatrist who alleges he was involved with ‘an authentic case of demonic possession.” A skeptic dismisses demonic possession as a relic of the dark ages.

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show
programme.desc: Is a powerfully rich cabal with a globalist agenda conspiring to destroy sovereign nations and impose authoritarian rule? Richard engages several independent journalists and researchers who point to numerous historical and current events they see as stepping stones towards achieving the goal of one-world government.

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show
programme.desc: Richard speaks with several independent researchers about the efforts of international bankers to control the course of history and enslave humanity through their monopoly of the creation of money and the manipulation of the money supply.

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show
programme.desc: End times prophecy experts discuss the possible identity of the antichrist and the timing of his emergence onto the world state. According to Revelations, a book in the Christian Bible, The antichrist will deceive the people of this world when he claims to be the true messiah.

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show
programme.sub-title: Are We Running Out of Oil?
programme.desc: Are we really running out of oil, or does the government and Big Oil just want us to think we are? Two proponents of the abiotic oil theory argue that oil is not a fossil fuel and actually replenishes itself deep within the earth. A researcher and author of a book on peak oil argues that the earth’s supply of oil is already in terminal decline.

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show
programme.desc: A lawyer and from the Pacific Northwest claims to have been part of a secret government time travel experiment, known as Project Pegasus.

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show
programme.desc: Two victims of alleged electronic harassment and organized gang-stalking recount their horrible ordeals. Richard investigates possible theories as to who is behind this program and why.

programme.title: Contact With Aliens: Abductions, Conspiracy and Deception
programme.sub-title: Contact With Aliens: Abductions, Conspiracy and Deception
programme.desc: Many UFO experiencers claim they've made contact with aliens. The ETs clearly have an interest in our planet. But what is their interest in mankind?

programme.title: Second Sight Paranormal
programme.sub-title: The Haunting of Oakleigh House: Where Shadows Lie in Wait
programme.desc: Built in 1883, the historic Oakleigh House of Mobile, AL is one of the South’s most haunted locations. Shadow figures, ghostly voices, and hair-raising encounters intrigue Psychic Medium Ericka Boussarhane and her team, Second Sight Paranormal, as they investigate Oakleigh’s dark and fascinating legacy.
